body.template:
<{rem:/*
    Use the next predefined vars for set folder or filename in template
    
    <{$root}>                   - root path on hosting (usually /public_html)
    <{$user_path}>              - root of user path ( set in users data) 
    <{$user_path_from_root}>    - path to user path from root
    <{$filename}>               - name of  current opened file
    <{$filename_from_root}>     - name of current opened file from root
    <{$filename_short}>         - name of  current opened file (short)
    <{$filename_short_wext}>    - name of  current opened file (short) without ext
    <{$module}>                 - synonym of filename_short_wext
    <{$filename_from_user}>     - name of current opened file from user
    <{$path}>                   - path to current opened file
    <{$path_from_root}>         - path current opened file from root
    <{$path_to_root}>           - relative path to root from path of current opened file
    <{$path_to_ws}>             - relative path to ws core lib
    <{$cursor}>                 - after the template insert, the cursor will be placed instead of a variable 
*/
:rem}>

$root               = "<{$root}>";
$user_path          = "<{$user_path}>";
$user_path_from_root= "<{$user_path_from_root}>";
$filename           = "<{$filename}>";
$filename_from_root = "<{$filename_from_root}>";
$filename_short     = "<{$filename_short}>";
$filename_short_wext= "<{$filename_short_wext}>";
$module             = "<{$module}>";
$filename_from_user = "<{$filename_from_user}>";
$path               = "<{$path}>";
$path_from_root     = "<{$path_from_root}>";
$path_to_root       = "<{$path_to_root}>";
$path_to_ws         = "<{$path_to_ws}>";
